attributes.action: Make the next prime minister look into revoking the spare room tax/bedroom tax.
attributes.additional_details: People on benefits are struggling to feed themselves. The universal credit service has been criticised recently on the news how fraudsters are targeting people on benefits and this spare room tax isn't helping.
attributes.background: I would like the prime minister to revoke the bedroom tax or spare room tax and look after UK citizens who are struggling to feed themselves. The under occupancy rules is disgusting in today's world. Universal credit is making people poor and this tax doesn't help either.
